tweets.text: @AaronBell4NUL @MattHancock @PHE_uk @EnvAgencyMids Someone help us

Rather curiously there hasn't been a single Tweet from the @EnvAgency in the last 24 hours bragging about how they 'Enhance", the environment.

https://t.co/WaaFQXr1lZ

@floodmo @KeeleUniversity @AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA It's spreading far and wide üòî I live 1.2 miles from the site and the toxic odour gets into our house on a daily basis. My heart goes out to everyone affected, especially the people who live even closer to the landfill.

UK just not getting it that the world expects integrity for COP 26.

Christiana Figueres :‚ÄúThere have been recent decisions in the UK that are not aligning with the ambition of the net zero target. It is worrisome. There are raised eyebrows among world leaders watching the UK.‚Äù

tweets.text: @lucyb221 @EnvAgencyMids @BBCPanorama @StinkStopthe I‚Äôm actually frantically trying to find somewhere to stay this weekend because I can‚Äôt take it anymore. Unfortunately it coincides with COVID restrictions being lifted so accommodation is quite full...

tweets.text:
At Health Questions I asked @MattHancock about the public health implications of the breaches at Walley's Quarry.

I know, from both the local GPs and those writing to me, that many residents are concerned for their health, both physically and mentally. @PHE_uk @EnvAgencyMids https://t.co/pwh6zUI4Zs

My 86yr old Mum lives with us, has heart failure & spent the early hours of the past 5 days struggling to breathe & has had no sleep, refusing to call an ambulance. We‚Äôve had enough now, spoke to Alison at EA & asked if anything was being done before someone dies #stopthestink

@SoTCityCouncil online pollution form doesn't seem to be working. Foul gases from Walleys quarry rife and entering house 6 miles from site. We need to support our NUL neighbours @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe @AaronBell4NUL #stopthestink

We understand that the current plan of @SCLibDems is to approve the development on the basis that the need for 4,000 more houses outweighs any environmental harm that would be caused by the development.

@cam_friends @MonicaHone @greenarteries

Toxic landfill gas from @RedIndustries2 walley's site surrounding my daughter's nursery in the Westlands this morning. She shouldn't have to breathe this air, please help us @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids üôè #stopthestink
@RomanGeezer @SaveLeaMarshes Please report this to the @EnvAgency @EnvAgencySE Incident hotline: 0800 80 70 60  #SaveOurRivers #StateOfNature #SDG6 #SDG14
